metadata.Plot: Someone in a prison run by a corrupt warden fakes the deaths of convicts to later use them as expendable assassins. A police officer is sent into the prison to gather evidence of the corruption.
metadata.Writer: Li Fu, Yun-Chiao Yeh, Domonic Muir
metadata.Actors: Jackie Chan, Andy Lau, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung
